column3: Traffic;Preah Sihanouk: According to preliminary reports
column4: TNB singer/rapper Nen Tum was in a LEXUS car on the way from Phnom Penh to Preah Sihanouk when it collided with a buffalo running across the road.------ The accident happened on the night of March 11
column5: 2020 at the National Road 4 in Prey Nop district
column6: Preah Sihanouk province.------Those in the car were reported to have suffered serious injuries and were taken to hospital.Â It is not yet known how many others were hurt in the incident
column7: but the driver of the vehicle
column9: was said to be badly injured. ------TNB
